text:
UNEP-WCMC | Cambridge, UK | Frontend | Full-time | Onsite |

As the World Conservation Monitoring Centre's Informatics team, we are building web apps to save the planet! We are looking for a front-end developer with an interest in mapping and visualisations to join our team to work both on existing products such as https://protectedplanet.net and new projects. We're a great team of devs and designers who are passionate about making a positive impact on the world and are looking for the right person to join our mission!

More details and application here: https://www.unep-wcmc.org/vacancies/web-developer-ad1040
